references.paper_title: Distribution on warp maps for alignment of open and closed curves
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for the group-theoretic approach to modeling phase variation used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Fréchet means of curves for signal averaging and application to ECG data analysis
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Fréchet means for curves, which is a key concept in the field of functional data analysis and is used extensively in this work.

references.paper_title: Bayesian registration of functions and curves
references.reason: This paper develops a Bayesian approach to functional data registration, which is a central problem in the current work.

references.paper_title: Nonlinear mixed effects modeling and warping for functional data using B-splines
references.reason: This paper provides a state-of-the-art frequentist method for functional data analysis, which is used as a benchmark in this work.

references.paper_title: Statistical Shape Analysis: With Applications in R
references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive overview of statistical shape analysis, which is closely related to the functional data analysis methods used in this work.
